name: EXTRACT
title: EXTRACT
description: Generic model of an Extract of some information from a repository.

element.short: Generic model of an Extract of some information from a repository.
element.definition: Generic model of an Extract of some information from a repository.

constraint.human: Sequence nr valid must satisfy range constraints

element.short: The content extracted and serialised from the source repository for this Extract.
element.definition: The content extracted and serialised from the source repository for this Extract.

element.short: The specification that this Extract actually conforms to; might not be identical with the specification of the corresponding request.
element.definition: The specification that this Extract actually conforms to; might not be identical with the specification of the corresponding request.

element.short: Reference to causing Request, if any.
element.definition: Reference to causing Request, if any.

element.short: Number of this Extract response in sequence of responses to Extract request identified by `_request_id_`.
element.definition: Number of this Extract response in sequence of responses to Extract request identified by `_request_id_`. If this is the sole response, or there was no request, value is 1.

element.short: Participations relevant to the creation of this Extract.
element.definition: Participations relevant to the creation of this Extract.
